response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value to you, we propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer takes into account the significant worth of the product to you, while also ensuring a fair return for us. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 12000}
